explains: n. 枪乌贼，（食用的）鱿鱼；乌贼状人造鱼饵；超导量子干涉器件（SQUID）；<英，俚>英镑
v. 用枪乌贼作饵捕鱼
wordGroup: giant squid [生]巨型乌贼；大王乌贼

sentences.en: Forward credits could be useful in the squid business.
sentences.cn: 远期信贷在鱿鱼生意中可能是有用的。

sentences.en: Although the squid is delicious, it doesn't agree with everyone.
sentences.cn: 鱿鱼虽然是美味，但是并不是人人都适合吃。

sentences.en: I walked into the cockpit and there was a squid there looking up at me!
sentences.cn: 我走进驾驶舱，那里有一只乌贼在抬头看着我！
